p: Because MAXENT implicitly assumes that grid cells have the same size when choosing random samples, equal area projections are preferable ( Elith et al., 2011). Therefore, prior to analyses, we reprojected the climatic layers onto a Behrmannâ€™s equal area projection, using a bilinear interpolation, with datum WGS1984 and a grid size resampled to 10 km 2. We used ArcGIS 10.1 for resampling and reprojection of the environmental layers.
